title: Al Maktoum Stadium
text:
Al-Maktoum Stadium () is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Dubai">Dubai</a>, <a href="United%20Arab%20Emirates">United Arab Emirates</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="Association%20football">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="Al%20Nasr%20SC%20%28Dubai%29">Al Nasr SC</a>. The stadium holds roughly 15,000 people.
It was upgraded for the <a href="2019%20AFC%20Asian%20Cup">2019 AFC Asian Cup</a>.
2019 AFC Asian Cup.
Al Maktoum Stadium hosted six games of the 2019 AFC Asian Cup, including a Round of 16 and a quarter-final match.
